title: E-Learning-Based Elementary Mathematics Practical Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary mathematics fundamentals and practical application experience
context.additional_context: Digital device-enabled environment, learner-tailored activity design, and integration of collaboration tools required

learning_goals: Learners strengthen practical competencies by completing at least three elementary mathematics problem-solving projects in a PBL environment
Learners achieve over 80% utilization of digital resources (interactive content, simulations, etc.) tailored to diverse learning styles
Learners experience community-based learning by conducting peer evaluations and feedback sessions at least three times using online collaboration tools
Learners demonstrate learning achievement by scoring 85+ on the comprehensive final assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
